raw_comment: I notice younger people tended to think more optimistically about the world becoming a better place than the older people. I wonder why in certain places different age groups think differently than in other places. It relates to me because I noticed that a lot of people think differently based on where they came from and this could be a representation of that.
ace_sentences: I notice that younger people tend to think more optimistically than older people.
Younger people tend to think that the world will become a better place.
I wonder why different age groups think differently in certain places.
I wonder why different age groups think differently in other places.
I noticed that many people think differently based on where they came from.
This difference could represent the difference between places.
